abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by Clarion Choir of Rachmaninoff's Liturgy of St John Chrysostom at St Paul's Chapel as part of Twelfth Night Festival.
lead_paragraph: Branching out from its usual repertory, the group gave a soaring performance of this expressive liturgical work.

headline.main: Clarion Choir Delves Into the Liturgy of St. John Chrysostom, a Rachmaninoff Rarity
headline.print_headline: Vaulting Into Spine-Tingling Territory With a Rachmaninoff Rarity

snippet: Branching out from its usual repertory, the group gave a soaring performance of this expressive liturgical work.

keywords.value: Liturgy of St John Chrysostom (Musical Work)
